results.query: What specific item does Voyager 1 carry to represent Earth's culture?
retrieved_chunks: The Voyager 1 spacecraft, launched by NASA in 1977, is currently the most distant human-made object from Earth. As of 2024, it is over 15 billion miles away. It carries the Golden Record, a 12-inch gold-plated copper disk containing sounds and images selected to portray the diversity of life and culture on Earth.
